metadata.dc:author: Streitenberger, Edgardo R
Rizzo, Mabel S
Suarez, Ariel I
Chavez, Claudio M
metadata.dc:description: Anaerobiospirillum thomasii has been reported as a causative agent of diarrhea in humans; however no bacteremia associated with this pathogen has been described so far. We present here the first case of fatal A. thomasii bacteremia in an alcoholic patient.
metadata.dc:subject: Bacteriemia
ARN ribosomal 16S
Anaerobiospirillum thomasii
16S ribosomal RNA
Anaerobiospirillum thomassi
Bacteremia
metadata.dc:title: Bacteriemia por Anaerobiospirillum thomasii con desenlace fatal.
[Anaerobiospirillum thomasii bacteremia with fatal outcome].
